sections.title: Symptoms
content: • You are getting the error below appearing in your console:
error CS1503: Argument `#1' cannot convert `___' expression to type `___'

sections.title: Cause
content: This error is caused when you try to assign a variable of type "integer" to a variable of type "string".
error CS1503: Argument `#1' cannot convert `___' expression to type `___'

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can use ToString() to change the integer to a string.
